title: The Answer's Dance

panel_structure.description: Figure reaching for an answer that keeps dancing away, each grasp causing it to shift to a new location, like chasing one's shadow
Person trying to see their own eyes directly, twisting impossibly, the fundamental limitation of self-perception visualized
